About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

My name is Manuel Brestak, I am 26 years old and an passionate software developer. I was aiming to create a portfolio website with practice oriented projects. You can find some of my projects here or on GitHub.

I am currently in my 5th semester of Business Informatics with an upcoming specialization in Software Engineering at the Ferdinand Porsche FernFH.

In addition, I am regularly outdoors and enjoy spending my free time playing ball sports, cycling and going for walks.
